--- title: neos.fit keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "Module that wraps constrained + global fitters in a differentiable form using the module fax. Uses the two-phase-solver." ---

from neos.models import nn_model_maker

g_fitter, c_fitter = get_solvers(nn_model_maker)
